tool_description: Calculates geographic distances between candidate locations and job locations, supporting various distance metrics and commute analysis.
error_messages: Invalid location format: Use 'City, State' or 'City, Country' format
Location not found: One or both locations could not be geocoded
Commute calculation failed: Unable to calculate commute time for given locations
usage: Provide candidate_location and job_location in standard geographic format. Optionally set distance_unit and enable commute time calculation.

location_compatibility.description: Location compatibility assessment (excellent, good, fair, poor)
